title: Loading Screen Never Appears
body:
I can use the client without any problems, message my friends and browse the shop, but when I queue up for a game I go through champ select as normal, but then the client disappears and. . . Nothing.

No bug splat, no error message, no disconnect message. Nothing. I bring the client back up and it says I've abandoned the match. Attempting to click reconnect causes the client to disappear and the loading screen still does not appear. 

Using the repair tool, would still like some help if this issue persists.

replies.body:
It sounds like your client is dropping its connection to our servers entirely when this happens, which often occurs as a result of conflicting network settings. I strongly suggest checking our [connection guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) for a list of steps that should help resolve this.

Let me know if this helped resolve the issue.

No, situation is completely different now. Can't patch the latest update to League, which is the second time this has happened to me and the only way I resolved that was by a fresh reinstall, and thanks to the download of League on this site that doesn't ever work I had to find the base install of League somewhere else on the internet because no advice I ever receive on here about patching problems ever helps.
Well, if the patching issue happens after the patcher hits 33%, this is definitely related to a connection drop. Can you give me more context as to how and where it fails?
